pages.text: "$(#8B4513)A richer coffee, a thicker milk foam, bringing a more balanced flavor experience$()."$(br2)$(#DAA520)Cappuccino$() is a coffee beverage that combines $(#8B4513)Espresso$() with $(#FFFACD)creamy milk foam$(). The $(#FFD700)bold coffee taste$() and the $(#FF69B4)light sweetness of milk$() create a perfect balance.$(br)Compared to a $(#DAA520)Latte$(), Cappuccino has a $(#8B4513)stronger coffee flavor$(), making it ideal for $(#FF4500)quick energy boosts$() and $(#FFD700)enhancing focus before battles$().

$(#FFD700)Cappuccino$() sits between $(#8B4513)Espresso$() and $(#DAA520)Latte$(), $(#FFD700)balancing bold coffee with silky milk foam$(), offering a $(#FF69B4)smoother and more flavorful experience$().$(br2)It is ideal for players who $(#FF4500)need a temporary mental boost$() but do not want the overstimulation of $(#DAA520)Triespresso$().

To make a $(#FFD700)Cappuccino$(), you need:$(br2)$(#8B4513)· One cup of standard $(#FFD700)Espresso$()$(br)$(#FFFACD)· An equal amount of steamed milk$()$(br)$(#FFFACD)· Thick milk foam on top$()$(br2)Compared to a $(#DAA520)Latte$(), a $(#FFD700)Cappuccino$() has a $(#8B4513)higher coffee ratio$(), making it better suited for players who $(#FF4500)crave a stronger flavor$().

pages.title: Cappuccino Features
pages.text: $(#FFD700)Effects when consumed$():$(br2)· $(#FFD700)Slightly increases speed for a short time$()$(br)· $(#FFD700)Barely affects hunger$()$(br)· $(#FF69B4)Slightly restores health$()$(br2)$(#8B0000)Cappuccino$() is great for $(#FFD700)pre-battle preparation$(), providing $(#FF4500)short but effective buffs$() while also $(#FF69B4)bringing warmth and comfort$().
